actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-963, by Mr. Moakley.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 219.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to S. 538. Upon adoption of this rule H.C.Res. 394 shall be considered as adopted. Upon receipt of a message from the Senate informing the House of the adoption of H.C.Res. 394, it shall be in order to consider the conference report on the bill S. 358 and all points of order against the confernce report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as having been read when called up for consideration.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving certain points of order against consideration of the conference report on the bill (S. 358) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to change the level, and preference system for admission, of immigrants to the United States, and to provide for administrative naturalization, and for other purposes, and against its consideration.

summary.text: Deems H. Con.Res. 394 to have been passed by the House. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 358 (immigration and aliens).

titles.title: Waiving certain points of order against consideration of the conference report on the bill (S. 358) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to change the level, and preference system for admission, of immigrants to the United States, and to provide for administrative naturalization, and for other purposes, and against its consideration.
